name: Lock Breaker
description:
"Lock Breaker" is very challenging and addictive game. Tap on the screen to start the game and then tap on the screen when pointer is on the randomly generated yellow color circle. This game has two modes, one is endless and the other is "Game Level".

In Endless mode you have to tap on the screen when pointer is going through yellow circle. In this mode there will be no level, you can play endless.

"Game level" is level based mode. In this mode every level needs the same no of yellow circle to break the lock and then you will be promoted to next level.

* Now challenge yourself and break the lock.
* Improve your focus and tapping skill.
